title: Why higher ed's AI rush could put corporate interests over public service and independence
description: Artificial intelligence technology has begun to transform higher education, raising a new set of profound questions about the role of universities in society. A string of high-profile corporate partnerships reflect how universities are embracing AI technology.

title: David AI Raises $50 Million to Bring Audio Data to AI Models
description: David AI Labs Inc. a startup selling audio data sets to help train artificial intelligence models, has raised $50 million from investors in a new round of funding — signaling a growing market for startups that provide the building blocks for AI development.
content: David AI Labs Inc. a startup selling audio data sets to help train artificial intelligence models, has raised $50 million from investors in a new round of funding — signaling a growing market for startups that provide the building blocks for AI devel... [421 chars]

title: Salesforce to spend $1 billion in Mexico over next five years to drive AI adoption
description: Salesforce said on Wednesday it would spend $1 billion in Mexico over the next five years, as the cloud software provider looks to expand its operations and drive artificial intelligence adoption.
content:
The company, which began operating in Mexico in 2006, said the investment will fund a new Mexico City office and a Global Delivery Center to support customers across the Americas.

title: 50 Cent Says He Wants To Use AI To Share His Unreleased Music
description: 50 Cent shared the plan while posting “1960s soul” versions of his songs made through artificial intelligence.
content: He began by sharing an alternate version of "21 Questions." “Now this sh*t is hot [fire],” he wrote. “I’m a use AI on all my unreleased songs and see what I got for ya!" From there, he posted a soulful version of “God Gave Me Style,” writing: “This f... [1057 chars]

title: Basic data literacy can boost AI use by teachers, study finds
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing educational paradigms and transforming teaching practice thanks to machine learning, natural language processing and personalized tutoring systems. One of the keys is the advanced analysis of students' learning data, which allows teachers to develop individualized teaching strategies.

title: OpenAI wants to build the next era of the web, and it’s shelling out billions to do it
description: OpenAI was an artificial intelligence research lab little known outside of Silicon Valley before ChatGPT debuted in November 2022.
content:
New York (CNN) — OpenAI was an artificial intelligence research lab little known outside of Silicon Valley before ChatGPT debuted in November 2022.

title: XAI to Raise $20 Billion After Nvidia and Others Boost Round
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI is raising more financing than initially planned, tapping backers including Nvidia Corp. to lift its ongoing funding round to $20 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

title: New rules to regulate cyberspace
description: KUALA LUMPUR: A new law ­specifically on the responsible use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is currently in the process of being drafted, says Gobind Singh Deo.

title: CareerBuilder, job website toppled by AI, wraps liquidation
description: The owner of former job recruitment sites CareerBuilder and Monster, which blamed artificial intelligence for their demise, won court approval to end a liquidation case by paying lenders and other creditors less than 10% of what they are owed.
